name: Apply for a Business License

user_need.i_need_to: apply for or renew my business license
user_need.so_that: I can legally operate my business in Modular City

need_is_met_when: understands the requirements for a business license
knows what documents are needed
can submit an application online or in person
receives their license within the stated timeframe
why_this_service_exists: It's something only the government does
There is clear demand from business owners
It helps ensure businesses meet local regulations
steps: Gather required documents (State tax ID, proof of insurance)
Complete the application form
Pay the $75 annual fee
Receive your license within 3-5 business days

name: Request Public Records

user_need.so_that: I can access information about government activities

need_is_met_when: understands what records are available
knows how to submit a request
receives records within the legal timeframe
understands any fees involved
why_this_service_exists: Government transparency is required by law
Citizens have a right to access public information
steps: Identify the records you need
Submit a request online or in person
Pay copying fees if applicable ($0.25 per page)
Receive records within 5-10 business days

name: Register to Vote

user_need.so_that: I can participate in local elections

need_is_met_when: understands eligibility requirements
can complete registration online or in person
receives confirmation of registration
knows where and when to vote
why_this_service_exists: The government is obligated to provide access to elections
steps: Confirm you are a U.S. citizen, 18+ years old, and reside in Modular City
Gather proof of identity and residence
Complete the registration form
Registration is immediate

name: Report a Pothole

user_need.i_need_to: report a pothole on a city street
user_need.so_that: it can be repaired and roads are safe to travel

need_is_met_when: can easily submit a report with location details
receives confirmation the report was received
can track the status of the repair
sees the pothole repaired
why_this_service_exists: Road maintenance is a core city responsibility
steps: Note the location of the pothole
Submit a report online with address or intersection
Optionally include a photo
Repair typically completed within 7-14 days

name: Start or Stop Water Service

user_need.i_need_to: start or stop water service at my address
user_need.so_that: I have water when I move in and don't pay for it when I move out

need_is_met_when: understands the process for starting or stopping service
knows what documents are needed
can schedule service changes in advance
service is activated or stopped on the requested date
why_this_service_exists: The city operates the municipal water system
Residents need control over their utility accounts
steps: Gather proof of identity and lease/deed
Submit request at least 2-3 business days in advance
Pay $25 service connection fee for new service
Service will be activated/stopped on your requested date

name: Report a Street Light Outage

user_need.i_need_to: report a broken or flickering street light
user_need.so_that: my neighborhood is safely lit at night

need_is_met_when: can easily identify and report the light location
receives confirmation the report was received
sees the light repaired
why_this_service_exists: Public lighting is a city responsibility
Citizen reports help identify problems quickly
steps: Note the pole number or nearest address
Submit a report online
Repair typically completed within 5-7 business days

name: Rent a City Facility

user_need.i_need_to: rent a park pavilion, community room, or athletic field
user_need.so_that: I can host an event or gathering

need_is_met_when: can see available facilities and dates
understands rental fees and rules
can reserve a facility online
receives confirmation of the booking
why_this_service_exists: Public facilities should be accessible to the community
steps: Browse available facilities
Check availability for your preferred date
Submit a rental application
Pay rental fee ($50-$200 depending on facility)

name: Register for Recreation Programs

user_need.i_need_to: register for sports leagues, classes, and activities
user_need.so_that: I or my family can participate in city programs

need_is_met_when: can browse available programs
understands program details, schedules, and fees
can register and pay online
receives confirmation and program information
why_this_service_exists: City programs are accessible to all residents
steps: Browse the program catalog
Select a program and register participants
Pay program fees (varies by program)
Receive confirmation and start date information

name: Apply for a Building Permit

user_need.i_need_to: apply for permits for construction, renovation, or demolition
user_need.so_that: my project meets safety codes and is legally approved

need_is_met_when: understands what permits are required for their project
knows what documents and plans to submit
can track permit application status
receives permit approval and can begin work
why_this_service_exists: Inspections verify work is done correctly
steps: Determine what permits your project requires
Prepare site plans and construction drawings
Submit application with contractor license information
Permit review takes 10-15 business days

name: Pay Property Taxes

user_need.so_that: I fulfill my tax obligation and avoid penalties

need_is_met_when: can view their tax bill and amount due
understands payment deadlines
can pay online without fees
receives confirmation of payment
steps: Look up your property tax bill
Review amount due and deadline
Pay online (no fee) or in person
Receive payment confirmation
